channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Eventify™
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Eventify™

item.title: CVE-2022-4110|2024-08-03T01:27:54.410Z -- unknown -- eventify%E2%84%A2
item.description: The Eventify™ WordPress plugin through 2.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
